name: GGJMGJ 2022: The Last Beacon -Prototype
description:
Hello! This is our team's entry for the ggj multiplayer game jam. This was going to be a survival space game but sadly we weren't able to finish the game. We did however had an awesome team and I wanted to make sure we showed off some of their work. 

We plan on releasing this game in the future. If you want to see more follow our discord or follow our page here. Thank you! 

(Please note we weren't able to finish our trailer, so I used a dev log video that I made during the halfway point of the jam for the submission since it required a video link. )

Check out these awesome folks:

Our composter (made the music for the game only) : www.madphilosophiesmusic.com 

Sound designer (In-game) & voice actor (unreleased Trailer) : https://twitter.com/addylishus/status/1268928072360751106
